long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For users of the NYC Idling Complaints portal (https://nycidling.azurewebsites.net/), NICK allows exporting all records from the user's account to a CSV file suitable for opening in Excel, Google Docs, or another spreadsheet program. It also uses assigned summons numbers from the portal to query NYC OATH Hearings Division Case Status (https://data.cityofnewyork.us/City-Government/OATH-Hearings-Division-Case-Status/jz4z-kudi) and include information on current OATH case status for the user's complaints.

The extension does not collect ANY information (personal or otherwise) from the user. It runs solely locally in the user's browser and only has access to the user's records when the user runs the extension while logged in to the NYC Idling Complaints portal. The OATH case status data available via NYC OpenData is public.

The NYC Idling Complaints portal is part of the NYC Citizens Air Complaint Program (https://www1.nyc.gov/site/dep/environment/idling-citizens-air-complaint-program.page).

v0.52 - Small tweak to adjust for changes in NYC OpenData server response so that NICK export will continue to function properly.
